A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am a fan of the Star Wars movie but not a fanatic\, I've watched all the movies at the cinema but I don't own any toys or other memorabilia nor have I read any of the books.

As a standalone movie with no connection to the canon\, entertaining but awkward and messy. (3.5 stars)

As a Star Wars movie I can't help but think that this is is a contrived and abrupt move away from the old movies. Too many changes in a single move\, no real sense of ARC or continuity. Sorry Disney\,  This aspect was not executed successfully and has left a gaping hole as a result.
